summary: This document is a Bureau of Prisons (BOP) population monitoring roster for the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York, dated August 10, 2019, showing inmate counts by housing unit. It includes a prisoner remand form for Jeffrey Epstein, indicating his admission to the facility on July 8, 2019. The roster lists numerous inmates by register number and housing location.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Listed as an inmate in the MCC New York roster with a register number (76318-054) and an admission date of July 8, 2019. Also appears on a prisoner remand form.

persons.name: Parfait Mutimura Niyomugabo
persons.context: Subject of a prisoner remand form, arrested on August 9, 2018, at JFK airport on charges including wire fraud.

events.title: Jeffrey Epstein admitted to MCC New York
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein is recorded as being admitted to the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York with an ARS (Admission, Release, Transfer) code of 'A-PRE'.

events.title: Arrest of Parfait Mutimura Niyomugabo
events.description: Parfait Mutimura Niyomugabo was arrested at JFK Airport Terminal 1 on charges including wire fraud.

events.title: MCC New York Population Census
events.description: A population monitoring census/roster is generated for the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York, showing inmate counts by housing unit.

keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein was an inmate at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York as of July 8, 2019, with register number 76318-054.
The document is a BOP roster dated August 10, 2019, providing a snapshot of the inmate population at MCC New York across various housing units.
A prisoner remand form for Jeffrey Epstein is included, confirming his status in federal custody.
Another individual, Parfait Mutimura Niyomugabo, is documented on a remand form for charges including wire fraud, arrested at JFK in August 2018.
The roster uses alphanumeric codes (e.g., BA, CA, EN) to designate different housing units within the facility.
